name: Impossible Sticky Cat
description:
First of all guys, this game is actually super hard and very rage-quitable. Just to warn you.... Now onto the pitch!

Join "Sticky Cat" on an adventure back to find her toys! Ride clouds, stick on walls, and see if you can beat this impossible game!

Explore 4 distinct areas as you explode your way ever higher to the top. Sometimes you'll fall, okay, like a lot of times you'll fall, but it'll only make it that much sweeter when you reach the top!
